name: Heroes of Scene
description: Heroes of scene is a multiplayer strategy game with an indirect control. You are in charge of the Kingdom of live toys. Build your own castle and summon toy warriors and spells to win!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP Processor: 1.7 GHz Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: AMD Radeon x1950 or better DirectX: Version 9.0 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 1 GB available space

A lot of people are saying this is a pay to win game. But if you put a little effort into the game and time you'll get cards and earn extra spots. You can upgrade your cards with the fake money you make on the sight, along with extra slots as your levels increase. This is a bit of a stradegy kinda game/ puzzle but you'll figure it out. Do feel like the tutorial could use a little work, you guys. But just play in training mode for a little while and go to a real game. Will be fine and dandy. 10/10. I like the game a lot.

Despite what seemingly everyone else thinks, I like this game. Highly reccomended.

Start with 3 trash cards.. Fight people who have paid money for rare cards.. Rare cards will have similar cost to deploy as your cards. but twice the hp and attack. One mows though 4 of your cards   Feel relief as your 4 minions finished off his first minion., and altnough yours only has 10% health left, its still alive. Realise that your opponent already has another 4 more minoins on the way.. and there is nothing you can do to stop them.  Recieve no new cards, because you only gain a reward card when you win.   Pros - If you are willing to spend 50$ on this game, you will have a good chance at building an incredable deck that will stomp every single non-paying player. If your not against a new player thats ok, you will likely still have fun with a fair 1v1 match.  Cons - If you are reading this, you are likely one of those non-paying players that is going to get stomped constantly.
